DataSourcePortable.Name: Status Documento
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="select A.handle, A.entradasaida,
 case A.entradasaida when 'E' then 'Liberado' when 'S' then 'Liberado' when 'I' then 'Bloqueado' when 'O' then 'Bloqueado' end as STATUS,
 case A.entradasaida when 'E' then 'blue-soft' WHEN 'S' then 'blue-soft' when 'I' then 'red-thunderbird' WHEN 'O' then 'red-thunderbird' end as CLASSE, 
 case A.entradasaida when 'E' then 'fa fa-check' WHEN 'S' then 'fa fa-check' when 'I' then 'fa fa-ban' WHEN 'O' then 'fa fa-ban'end as ICONE
 from fn_documentos A" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="ENTRADASAIDA" From="A" Path="ENTRADASAIDA" /> <Field Alias="STATUS" From="A" Path="STATUS" /> <Field Alias="CLASSE" From="A" Path="CLASSE" /> <Field Alias="ICONE" From="A" Path="ICONE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
